justification: The 737-NG Customer Experience project reconfigures the interior of the 122 Boeing 737-NG (800) aircraft to install the Panasonic eX1 IFE system. The LiveTV Passenger Entertainment System is currently installed on the 218 Boeing 737-NG aircraft. This Engineering Authorization (EA) will remove the LiveTV IFE system from the 122 800 series 737 aircraft.
parts_json: [{"part":"MS24658-23D","desc":"IFE Power Switch","type":"Remove","qty":"1"},{"part":"N40001-145","desc":"IFE POWER ON OFF placard","type":"Remove","qty":"1"},{"part":"NSA939511-03","desc":"Plug","type":"Add","qty":"2"},{"part":"N40001-143","desc":"Placard","type":"Remove","qty":"1"},{"part":"6TC6-10","desc":"Circuit Breakers IFE AC POWER 1, IFE AC POWER 2","type":"Remove","qty":"2"},{"part":"2TC49-3","desc":"Circuit Breaker IFE DC CONTROL","type":"Remove","qty":"1"},{"part":"NSA939511-03","desc":"Plug","type":"Add","qty":"3"},{"part":"N40001-457","desc":"Label Cover","type":"Add","qty":"1"},{"part":"N40001-065","desc":"Placard","type":"Remove","qty":"1"}]
instructions_json:
[{"instruction":"P5 PILOT OVERHEAD PANEL

Remove IFE Power Switch P/N MS24658-23D (S9624) from Cockpit Switch Panel. 

Remove Placard 'IFE POWER ON OFF' P/N N40001-145 from the P5 panel. and discard locally. 
Reference Thales Drawing 188139 SH 5, Detail H. 

Install Plug (P/N NSA939511-03)—reference Thales Drawing 188139 SH 5, Detail H.

Inside the P5 panel, remove Placard P/N N40001-143 (S9624) and discard locally—reference Thales Drawing 188139 SH 5, Detail H.","notes":""},{"instruction":"P6-1 PANEL

Unwrap daisy-chained wires  from (circuit breakers located at):
TODO:","notes":""},{"instruction":"Remove quantity 2 circuit breaker, P/N 6TC6-10, (IFE AC POWER 1, IFE AC POWER 2).

Remove quantity 1 circuit breaker, P/N 2TC49-3, (IFE DC CONTROL). 

Discard removed items locally—reference Thales Drawing 188139 SH 5, Detail F and Flag Note 52.

Install three (3) plugs (P/N NSA939511-03) and three (3) Label Cover (P/N N40001-457) at locations where circuit breakers were removed—reference Thales Drawing 188139 SH 5, Detail H and Flag Note 5.","notes":""},{"instruction":"P6-4 PANEL

Unwrap daisy-chained wires  from (circuit breakers located at):
B11-1 to B12-1
B12-1 to B14-1

Add wirewrap from B11-1 to B14-1 per dwg 368911-035/036

Unwrap daisy-chained wires  from (circuit breakers located at):
A1J1-47 to B12-2
B12-2 to C12-2

Add wirewrap from A1J1-47 to C12-2 per dwg 368911-036","notes":""},{"instruction":"Remove Circuit Breaker(B12) P/N 2TC49-5 (IFE DC BUS) and discard locally. 

Install Plug (P/N NSA939511-03) and Label Cover (P/N N40001-457)—reference Thales Drawing 188139 SH 5, Detail G and Flag Notes 51 and 52.

Inside P6-4 panel, remove placard, C9203 (P/N N40001-065) and discard. Reference Thales Drawing 188139 SH 5, Detail G and Flag Note 51.","notes":""},{"instruction":"Ensure the work area is clean and clear of tools and debris.","notes":""}]
